item.title: Terminal Shortcuts! (Compilation)
item.description: Here are few short-cuts to enhance your command line skills: To open the default editor: Ctrl-x Ctrl-e To execute the last command again $ !! To use the last string of command: $ !$ # (or) Alt+.(dot) To move $ Ctrl-f # -> Forward one character. $ Ctrl-b # -> Backwards one character. $ Ctrl-a # —> Move to the beginning of the line. $ Ctrl-e # —> Move to the end of the line.
